name: Art Exhibition: Van Gogh's Masterpieces
description: Explore the brilliance of Vincent van Gogh in this captivating exhibition featuring his most iconic works.

name: Live Music Night: Jazz & Blues Fusion
description: Get ready for a night of soulful sounds with a fusion of jazz and blues performed by local talents.

name: Food Festival: A Taste of the World
description: Embark on a culinary adventure around the globe with delicious food stalls representing diverse cuisines.

name: Film Screening: Classic Movie Night
description: Relive the golden age of cinema with a screening of timeless classics from Hollywood's heyday.
